- The [93mGeneralization[0m of the [93mPeriodic[0m [93mTable[0m: The '[93mPeriodic[0m [93mTable[0m' of '[93mDark[0m [93mMatter[0m'
- [93mLiquid[0m–[93mliquid[0m [93mtransition[0m in [93melemental[0m [93mliquids[0m [95minvestigated[0m by [93msound[0m [93mvelocity[0m [93mmeasurements[0m: [93mtrends[0m in the [93mperiodic[0m [93mtable[0m: [93mAbstract[0m The [93mvelocity[0m of [93msound[0m [93mhas[0m been [93mmeasured[0m as a [93mfunction[0m of [93mtemperature[0m to [95minvestigate[0m [93mstructural[0m [91mchanges[0m in the [93mmolten[0m As–[93mSb[0m [93malloy[0m. The [93moverall[0m [93mprofile[0m of [93mtemperature[0m [93mdependence[0m of the [93msound[0m [93mvelocity[0m [91mchanges[0m [93msmoothly[0m from [93mSb[0m to As. The [93mresults[0m [93mindicate[0m that a [93mtendency[0m to [91mchange[0m [93mstructures[0m in the [93msupercooled[0m [93mstate[0m [93mdevelops[0m with [93mincreasing[0m As [93mfraction[0m, and [93mconfirm[0m the [93mprevious[0m [93mconclusion[0m that [93mmolten[0m As [91mchanges[0m [93mrapidly[0m its [93mstructure[0m in the [93mundercooled[0m [93mstate[0m and is [93malready[0m in the [93mhigh[0m-[93mtemperature[0m [93mside[0m of an [93massumed[0m [93mliquid[0m–[93mliquid[0m [93mtransition[0m at the [93mmelting[0m [93mpoint[0m.
- [93mHuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93mcases[0m [93mreported[0m to [93mhealth[0m [93mfacilities[0m in the [93mVolta[0m [93mregion[0m of [93mGhana[0m, [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m.: [93mIntroduction[0m: [93mAlthough[0m [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m [93moccur[0m [93mless[0m [93mfrequently[0m than [93mother[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93minjuries[0m, [93mthey[0m [93mpresent[0m [93mnotable[0m [93mpublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mchallenges[0m, [93myet[0m [93mthey[0m [93mhave[0m [93mreceived[0m [93mrelatively[0m [93mlittle[0m [93mattention[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mexamined[0m the [93mincidence[0m, [93mtrend[0m, and [93mdistribution[0m of [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m in the [93mVolta[0m [93mRegion[0m of [93mGhana[0m from [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m. [93mMethod[0m: A [93mretrospective[0m [93manalysis[0m of [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjury[0m [93mdata[0m from the [93mDistrict[0m [93mHealth[0m [93mInformation[0m [33mManagement[0m [92mSystem[0m [93m2[0m ([93mDHIMS[0m-[93m2[0m) for the [93mVolta[0m [93mRegion[0m was [93mconducted[0m for the [93mperiod[0m [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m. [93mData[0m on [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m were [93mobtained[0m from the [93mmonthly[0m [93moutpatient[0m ([93mOPD[0m) [93mmorbidity[0m [93mreport[0m [93mform[0m. [93mVariables[0m [93mavailable[0m and [93mextracted[0m were [93mage[0m, [93msex[0m, [93mdistrict[0m and [93myear[0m of [93mreport[0m. The [93mdata[0m was [93manalyzed[0m [93mdescriptively[0m [93musing[0m [93mMicrosoft[0m [93mExcel[0m and [93mQuantum[0m [93mGeographic[0m [93mInformation[0m [92mSystem[0m ([93mQGIS[0m) and the [93mfindings[0m [93mpresented[0m in [93mtables[0m and [93mgraphs[0m. [93mResult[0m: A [93mtotal[0m of [93m931[0m [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m were [93mreported[0m to [93mhealth[0m [93mfacilities[0m from [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m, with the [93mhighest[0m [93mincidence[0m of [93m12[0m.[93m0[0m [93mper[0m [93m100[0m,[93m000[0m [93mrecorded[0m in [93m2021[0m and the [93mlowest[0m, [93m9[0m.[93m7[0m [93mper[0m [93m100[0m,[93m000[0m in [93m2019[0m. [93mMales[0m and [93myoung[0m [93madults[0m between the [93mages[0m of [93m18[0m-[93m34[0m [93maccounted[0m for [93m58[0m.[93m1[0m and [93m41[0m.[93m1[0m%, [93mrespectively[0m of [93mall[0m [93mcases[0m [93mreported[0m. [93mGeographically[0m, [93mKetu[0m [93mNorth[0m [93mrecorded[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mnumber[0m of [93mcases[0m, [93m184[0m ([93m19[0m.[93m8[0m%). [93mThere[0m [93mwe[0m no [93mreported[0m [93mdeath[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mHuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m in the [93mVolta[0m [93mRegion[0m [93mhave[0m [93mshown[0m an [93mupward[0m [93mtrend[0m over the [93myears[0m [93mstudied[0m, with [93mmales[0m and [93myoung[0m [93madults[0m [93maged[0m [93m18[0m to [93m34[0m [93myears[0m [93maffected[0m in the [93mmajority[0m of the [93mreported[0m [93mcases[0m. While the [93mcauses[0m and [93minfection[0m [93moutcomes[0m were not [93mdetermined[0m, this [93mstudy[0m [93mprovides[0m [93messential[0m [93mbaseline[0m [93mdata[0m for [93mfurther[0m [93mresearch[0m into the [93mcauses[0m and [93meffects[0m of these [93minjuries[0m.
- [93mAnalysis[0m of the [93mpost[0m-[93mincorporation[0m [93mperiod[0m of [93mhealth[0m [93mtechnologies[0m [93mincorporated[0m into the [93mSUS[0m, from [93m2012[0m to [93m2022[0m.: [93mObjective[0m: To [93manalyze[0m the [93mtime[0m [93melapsed[0m in the [93mpost[0m-[93mincorporation[0m [93mprocess[0m of [93mprocedures[0m, [93morthoses[0m, [93mprostheses[0m, and [93mspecial[0m [93mmaterials[0m, with a [93mfocus[0m on [93mcompliance[0m with the [93mlegal[0m [93mdeadline[0m of [93m180[0m [93mdays[0m [93mestablished[0m for the [93mprovision[0m of the [93mtechnology[0m. [93mMethods[0m: The [93manalysis[0m was [93mconducted[0m with [93mprocedures[0m and [93morthoses[0m, [93mprostheses[0m, and [93mspecial[0m [93mmaterials[0m [93mrecommended[0m for [93mincorporation[0m by the [93mNational[0m [93mCommission[0m for the [93mIncorporation[0m of [93mTechnologies[0m from [93m2012[0m to [93m2022[0m, and the [93mtechnology[0m [93midentification[0m [93mcode[0m [93mcreated[0m in the [33mManagement[0m [92mSystem[0m for the [93mTable[0m of [93mProcedures[0m, [93mMedicines[0m, [93mOrthoses[0m, [93mProstheses[0m and [93mSpecial[0m [93mMaterials[0m of the [93mBrazilian[0m [93mUnified[0m [93mHealth[0m [92mSystem[0m, after [93mincorporation[0m. For the [93mtechnologies[0m [93midentified[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mcalculated[0m the [93mmedian[0m [93mperiods[0m ([93mQ1[0m-[93mQ3[0m) of the [93mdays[0m [93melapsed[0m during the [93mincorporation[0m and [93mpost[0m-[93mincorporation[0m [93mperiods[0m. In [93maddition[0m, the [93mproportion[0m of [93mtechnologies[0m [93moffered[0m [93maccording[0m to the [93mlegal[0m [93mdeadline[0m was [93mverified[0m, and the [93minfluence[0m of [93mvariables[0m on the [93mpost[0m-[93mincorporation[0m [93mperiod[0m was [93manalyzed[0m. [93mResults[0m: Among [93m41[0m [93mreports[0m on [93mprocedures[0m, [93morthoses[0m, [93mprostheses[0m, and [93mspecial[0m [93mselected[0m [93mmaterials[0m, [93m79[0m [93mtechnologies[0m were [93manalyzed[0m. The [93mcoding[0m [93mperiod[0m, [93mdefined[0m as the [93mbenchmark[0m for the [93msupply[0m of the [93mtechnology[0m, [93mhad[0m a [93mmedian[0m of [93m204[0m ([93m57[0m-[93m425[0m) [93mdays[0m. This [93mperiod[0m was [93mlonger[0m than [93m180[0m [93mdays[0m in [93m64[0m% of the [93mtechnologies[0m [93massessed[0m. [93mVariables[0m [93msuch[0m as the [93morganization[0m [93mgroup[0m to which the [93mtechnology[0m [93mbelongs[0m, [93mindication[0m of the [93mneed[0m to [93madapt[0m for [93mimplementation[0m in the [93mincorporation[0m [93mreport[0m, and [93mdelay[0m in the [93mevaluation[0m [93mperiod[0m for [93mincorporation[0m [93mseem[0m to [93minfluence[0m the [93mperiod[0m for [93mproviding[0m the [93mtechnology[0m. [93mConclusions[0m: The [93meffective[0m [93mprovision[0m of [93mtechnologies[0m [93mincorporated[0m into the [93mhealth[0m [92msystem[0m in [93mBrazil[0m [93mhas[0m not [93moccurred[0m within the [93mexpected[0m [93mperiod[0m of [93m180[0m [93mdays[0m in [93mmost[0m [93mcases[0m, which [93mlimits[0m [93mtheir[0m [93maccessibility[0m to the [93mpopulation[0m. [93mAnticipating[0m the [93mneed[0m for [93madaptation[0m before [93mimplementation[0m, even during [93mincorporation[0m, [93mseems[0m to be a [93mway[0m of [93mreducing[0m the [93mpost[0m-[93mincorporation[0m [93mperiod[0m.
- [93mEpidemiology[0m of [93manti[0m-[93mneutrophil[0m [93mcytoplasmic[0m [93mantibody[0m-[93massociated[0m [93mvasculitis[0m in [93mLithuania[0m, [93m2012[0m-[93m2021[0m: a [93mretrospective[0m [93mcohort[0m [93mstudy[0m.: [93mObjectives[0m: The [93maim[0m of this [93mstudy[0m was to [93massess[0m the [93mincidence[0m, [93mprevalence[0m and [93mmortality[0m of [93manti[0m-[93mneutrophil[0m [93mcytoplasmic[0m [93mantibody[0m ([93mANCA[0m)-[93massociated[0m [93mvasculitis[0m ([93mAAV[0m) in [93mLithuania[0m. [92mDesign[0m: [93mRetrospective[0m [93mcohort[0m [93mstudy[0m. [93mSetting[0m: [93mLithuanian[0m [93mNational[0m [93mHealth[0m [93mInsurance[0m [93mFund[0m and [93mCauses[0m of [93mDeath[0m [93mregistries[0m, [93mcovering[0m [93m1[0m [93mJanuary[0m [93m2012[0m through [93m31[0m [93mDecember[0m [93m2021[0m. [93mParticipants[0m: [93mPatients[0m were [93midentified[0m from [93mnational[0m [93mhealthcare[0m [93mregistries[0m in [93mLithuania[0m. The [93mfollowing[0m [93minclusion[0m [93mcriteria[0m were [93mapplied[0m: [93m1[0m) [95mdiagnosis[0m of [93meosinophilic[0m [93mgranulomatosis[0m with [93mpolyangiitis[0m ([93mEGPA[0m), [93mgranulomatosis[0m with [93mpolyangiitis[0m ([93mGPA[0m) or [93mmicroscopic[0m [93mpolyangiitis[0m ([93mMPA[0m) ([95mdiagnosis[0m [93mcodes[0m [93mM30[0m.[93m1[0m, [93mM31[0m.[93m3[0m and [93mM31[0m.[93m7[0m, [93maccording[0m to [93mInternational[0m [93mClassification[0m of [93mDiseases[0m [93m10[0m [93mth[0m [93mversion[0m ([93mICD[0m-[93m10[0m)) [93mrecorded[0m between [93m1[0m [93mJanuary[0m [93m2012[0m and [93m31[0m [93mDecember[0m [93m2021[0m; [93m2[0m) [95mdiagnosis[0m of [93mAAV[0m was [93mrecorded[0m in the [93mdatabase[0m at [93mleast[0m [93mtwice[0m with at [93mleast[0m [93m1[0m-[93mmonth[0m [93mperiod[0m between the [93mtwo[0m [93mtimepoints[0m; [93m3[0m) a [93mrecord[0m of at [93mleast[0m [93monce[0m [93mprescribed[0m [93mreimbursed[0m [93mmedication[0m-[93mglucocorticoids[0m ([93mprednisolone[0m or [93mmethylprednisolone[0m), [93mconventional[0m [93msynthetic[0m [93mdisease[0m-[93mmodifying[0m [93manti[0m-[93mrheumatic[0m [93mdrugs[0m ([93mmethotrexate[0m, [93mazathioprine[0m, [93mhydroxychloroquine[0m and [93mcyclophosphamide[0m) or [93mbiological[0m [93mdisease[0m-[93mmodifying[0m [93manti[0m-[93mrheumatic[0m [93mdrug[0m ([93mrituximab[0m or [93mavailable[0m [93mbiosimilars[0m); and [93m4[0m) [93mage[0m >[93m18[0m [93myears[0m at the [93mtime[0m of [95mdiagnosis[0m. [93mOutcome[0m [93mmeasures[0m: [93mData[0m for the [93manalysis[0m [93mincluded[0m [93msex[0m, [93mage[0m, [93mICD[0m-[93m10[0m [93mcode[0m of [93mAAV[0m, the [93mfirst[0m [93mdate[0m of [93mAAV[0m [95mdiagnosis[0m and [93mdate[0m of [93mdeath[0m. The [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m was [93msubdivided[0m into [93mperiods[0m [93m1[0m ([93m2013[0m-[93m2015[0m), [93m2[0m ([93m2016[0m-[93m2018[0m) and [93m3[0m ([93m2019[0m-[93m2021[0m). [93mTemporal[0m [93mtrends[0m of the [93mincidence[0m of [93mAAV[0m were [93massessed[0m. [93mPoint[0m [93mprevalence[0m [93mdata[0m were [93mrecorded[0m. [93mSex[0m- and [93mage[0m-[93mstandardised[0m [93mmortality[0m [93mratios[0m ([93mSMRs[0m) were [93mcalculated[0m. The [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m of [93mpatients[0m with [93mAAV[0m was [93mestimated[0m by [93mstandard[0m [93msingle[0m-[93mdecrement[0m [93mlife[0m-[93mtable[0m [93manalysis[0m. [93mResults[0m: [93mWe[0m [93midentified[0m [93m236[0m [93mpatients[0m with [93mAAV[0m ([93mfemale[0m, [93m58[0m%) with an [93mannual[0m [93mincidence[0m of [93m8[0m.[93m22[0m [93mper[0m [93m1[0m [93m000[0m [93m000[0m [93madult[0m [93minhabitants[0m ([93mperiod[0m [93m1[0m, [93m9[0m.[93m83[0m; [93mperiod[0m [93m2[0m, [93m6[0m.[93m88[0m; [93mperiod[0m [93m3[0m, [93m7[0m.[93m95[0m). [93mIncreasing[0m [93mincidence[0m was [93mnoted[0m for [93mMPA[0m ([93mperiod[0m [93m1[0m, [93m0[0m.[93m9[0m; [93mperiod[0m [93m3[0m, [93m2[0m.[93m49[0m). The [93mincidence[0m of [93mGPA[0m ([93m4[0m.[93m89[0m [93mper[0m [93m1[0m [93m000[0m [93m000[0m [93minhabitants[0m [93mper[0m [93myear[0m) was [93mthree[0m [93mtimes[0m [93mhigher[0m than the [93mtotal[0m [93mincidence[0m of [93mEGPA[0m and [93mMPA[0m. The [93mprevalence[0m of [93mAAV[0m [93mper[0m [93m1[0m [93m000[0m [93m000[0m [93madult[0m [93mpopulation[0m [93mincreased[0m from [93m35[0m.[93m92[0m in [93m2015[0m to [93m69[0m.[93m14[0m in [93m2021[0m. [93m40[0m [93mdeaths[0m were [93mrecorded[0m during the [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m, with a [93mmean[0m [93mage[0m at [93mdeath[0m of [93m65[0m.[93m2[0m (±[93m13[0m.[93m03[0m). [93mAAV[0m was [93massociated[0m with [93mreduced[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m [93mcompared[0m with the [93mgeneral[0m [93mpopulation[0m, [93mespecially[0m when [95mdiagnosed[0m at a [93myoung[0m [93mage[0m. The [93mSMRs[0m for the [93mtotal[0m [93mAAV[0m [93mcohort[0m [93mrevealed[0m a [93mdecreasing[0m [93mtrend[0m: [93m1[0m.[93m79[0m in [93mperiod[0m [93m1[0m and [93m1[0m.[93m67[0m in [93mperiod[0m [93m3[0m. [93mConclusions[0m: [93mAAV[0m is [93massociated[0m with [93mincreased[0m [93mmortality[0m. During the [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m, the [93mincidence[0m of [93mAAV[0m was [93mfound[0m to be [93mstable[0m, and the [93mprevalence[0m [93mhas[0m [93mincreased[0m.
- A [93mfive[0m-[93mdecade[0m [93mreview[0m of [93macademic[0m [93mresearch[0m on [93mhealthcare[0m [93msupply[0m [93mchain[0m: a [93mbibliometric[0m [93mapproach[0m [93musing[0m [93mco[0m-[93mword[0m [93manalysis[0m and [93mbibliographic[0m [93mcoupling[0m.: [93mPurpose[0m: This [93mpaper[0m [93manalysed[0m the [93mimpact[0m and [93mevolution[0m of [93mscientific[0m [93mresearch[0m on the [93mhealthcare[0m [93msupply[0m [93mchain[0m ([93mHCS[0m) from a [93mlongitudinal[0m [93mperspective[0m, [93mcovering[0m the [93mperiod[0m [93m1971[0m-[93m2024[0m. The [93mstudy[0m [93mused[0m [93mdata[0m from the [93mWeb[0m of [93mScience[0m and [93mScopus[0m [93mdatabases[0m to [93midentify[0m [93memerging[0m and [93mestablished[0m [93mareas[0m of [93mstudy[0m in the [93mfield[0m of [93mHCS[0m. [92mDesign[0m/[93mmethodology[0m/[93mapproach[0m: A [93mbibliometric[0m [93mstudy[0m was [93mconducted[0m [93musing[0m a [93mdataset[0m of [93m3[0m,[93m602[0m [93mpublications[0m. The [93manalysis[0m [93mfocused[0m on [93mkeyword[0m [93mco[0m-[93moccurrences[0m to [93mexamine[0m the [93mevolution[0m of [93mHCS[0m [93mresearch[0m. The [93manalysis[0m of [93m3[0m,[93m602[0m [93mpublications[0m [93mallowed[0m the [93midentification[0m of [93mkey[0m [93mthemes[0m and [93mtrends[0m in the [93mfield[0m and [93moffers[0m a [93mcomprehensive[0m [93mview[0m of the [93mstate[0m of the [93mart[0m. The [93mresults[0m are [93mpresented[0m through [93mtables[0m, [93mdiagrams[0m and [93mlongitudinal[0m [93mmaps[0m, [93mthus[0m [93mfacilitating[0m a [93mclearer[0m [93munderstanding[0m of the [93mresearch[0m [93mlandscape[0m. [93mPractical[0m [93mimplications[0m: The [93mfindings[0m [93mhave[0m [93mpractical[0m [93mimplications[0m for [93mresearchers[0m and [93mscholars[0m in the [93mHSC[0m [93mdomain[0m. By [93memploying[0m [93mbibliometric[0m [93manalysis[0m and [93mvisual[0m [93mrepresentations[0m, a [93munique[0m [93mperspective[0m on the [93mHCS[0m [93mlandscape[0m is [93mpresented[0m. - [93mAccurate[0m [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m in [93matomistic[0m [92msystems[0m [93mvia[0m [93mquantum[0m [93mDrude[0m [93moscillators[0m.: [93mAccurately[0m [92mmodeling[0m [93mpolarization[0m and [93mvan[0m [93mder[0m [93mWaals[0m ([93mvdW[0m) [93minteractions[0m in [93matomistic[0m [92msystems[0m [93mtypically[0m [93mrequires[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mlevel[0m [93mquantum[0m-[93mmechanical[0m [93mmethods[0m that are [93mcomputationally[0m [93mexpensive[0m, [93mhence[0m [93mlimited[0m in [93mapplicability[0m. To [93maddress[0m this [93mchallenge[0m, [93mefficient[0m [93myet[0m [93mphysically[0m [93mgrounded[0m [92mmodels[0m are [93mneeded[0m-[93mones[0m that not only [93menable[0m [93maccurate[0m [93mpredictions[0m but [93malso[0m [93mprovide[0m [93minsight[0m into how [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m [93mscale[0m in [93mcomplex[0m [93mmolecular[0m and [93mmaterial[0m [92msystems[0m. This [93mreview[0m [93mhighlights[0m the [93mquantum[0m [93mDrude[0m [93moscillator[0m ([93mQDO[0m) [92mmodel[0m, a [93mphysically[0m [93mmotivated[0m and [93mcomputationally[0m [93mefficient[0m [92mframework[0m that [93mcaptures[0m the [93messential[0m [93mfeatures[0m of [93melectronic[0m [93mresponse[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mpolarization[0m and [93mdispersion[0m [93mforces[0m, [93macross[0m a [93mwide[0m [93mrange[0m of [93mchemical[0m and [93mmaterial[0m [92msystems[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdiscuss[0m how the [93mQDO[0m [92mmodel[0m [93mquantitatively[0m [93mreproduces[0m the [93mpolarization[0m [93mresponse[0m of [93mmany[0m-[93melectron[0m [93matoms[0m and how [93mkey[0m [93mcomponents[0m of [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m-[93mexchange[0m-[93mrepulsion[0m, [93mpolarization[0m, and [93mdispersion[0m-[93memerge[0m [93mnaturally[0m in [93mQDO[0m [93mdimers[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, the [92mmodel[0m [93mprovides[0m [93mpredictive[0m [93mscaling[0m [93mlaws[0m that [93melucidate[0m [93mtrends[0m in [93mpolarizability[0m and [93mdispersion[0m [93macross[0m the [93mperiodic[0m [93mtable[0m and in [93mmolecular[0m [93massemblies[0m. By [93muniting[0m [93minterpretability[0m, [93maccuracy[0m, and [93mefficiency[0m, the [93mQDO[0m [92mmodel[0m [93moffers[0m a [93mversatile[0m [93mapproach[0m for [92mmodeling[0m [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m in [92msystems[0m [93mranging[0m from [93misolated[0m [93mmolecules[0m to [93mcomplex[0m [93mcondensed[0m [93mphases[0m and [93mnanostructured[0m [93mmaterials[0m.

[93manalysis[0m from [93m2000[0m to [93m2020[0m.: [93mPurpose[0m: [93mWe[0m [93mapplied[0m the [93maverage[0m [93mlifespan[0m [93mshortened[0m ([93mALSS[0m) [93mmeasure[0m to [93mexamine[0m [93mlifespan[0m'[93ms[0m [91mchanges[0m among [93mindividuals[0m who [93mdied[0m from [93mmalignancies[0m of the [93mcentral[0m [93mnervous[0m [92msystem[0m ([93mCNS[0m) in [93mJapan[0m from [93m2000[0m to [93m2020[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mMortality[0m [93mdata[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mCNS[0m [93mcancers[0m were [93mobtained[0m from the [93mWorld[0m [93mHealth[0m [93mOrganization[0m [93mMortality[0m [93mDatabase[0m. [93mYears[0m of [93mlife[0m [93mlost[0m ([93mYLL[0m) were [93mcalculated[0m [93musing[0m [93mJapanese[0m [93mlife[0m [93mtables[0m. [93mALSS[0m was [93mcalculated[0m as the [93mratio[0m between [93mYLL[0m and the [93mexpected[0m [93mlifespan[0m, and its [93m95[0m% [93mconfidence[0m [93minterval[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m) was [93mcalculated[0m [93musing[0m the [93mbootstrap[0m [93mmethod[0m. [93mResults[0m: Over the [93mstudy[0m, the [93mage[0m-[93mstandardized[0m [93mmortality[0m [93mrates[0m [93madjusted[0m to the [93mWorld[0m [93mStandard[0m [93mPopulation[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mCNS[0m [93mcancers[0m [93mincreased[0m from [93m1[0m.[93m0[0m to [93m1[0m.[93m3[0m [93mdeaths[0m [93mper[0m [93m100[0m,[93m000[0m [93mmen[0m and from [93m0[0m.[93m7[0m to [93m0[0m.[93m9[0m [93mdeaths[0m [93mper[0m [93m100[0m,[93m000[0m [93mwomen[0m. [93mALSS[0m [93mresults[0m [93mindicated[0m that [93mmen[0m with [93mCNS[0m [93mmalignancies[0m [93mlost[0m [93m30[0m.[93m7[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m29[0m.[93m2[0m-[93m32[0m.[93m2[0m) of [93mtheir[0m [93mlifespan[0m in [93m2000[0m, and [93m24[0m.[93m3[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m23[0m.[93m4[0m-[93m25[0m.[93m3[0m) in [93m2020[0m. [93mSimilarly[0m, [93mALSS[0m [93mvalues[0m for [93mwomen[0m [93mdecreased[0m from [93m32[0m.[93m9[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m31[0m.[93m3[0m-[93m34[0m.[93m5[0m) to [93m25[0m.[93m2[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m24[0m.[93m1[0m-[93m26[0m.[93m3[0m) over the [93msame[0m [93mperiod[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mOur[0m [93mstudy[0m [93mrevealed[0m a [93mgain[0m in [93mlifespan[0m of [93mindividuals[0m with [93mCNS[0m [93mcancers[0m in [93mboth[0m
